content.question: Let h be the depth, in feet, of oil in the tank. How fast is the depth of oil in the tank increasing when h = 4 ? Indicate units of measure.

frqParts.text: Let h be the depth, in feet, of oil in the tank. How fast is the depth of oil in the tank increasing when h = 4 ? Indicate units of measure.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
